version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Initial release

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Hide save button if on folder

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Added checking for deleted track

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Fixed but with deleting code where script would crash if subfolder is deleted

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Fixed bug when creating multiple same versions if multiple tracks are created + Fixed selecting track items

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Fixed another minor bug with deleted checking (subfolders with no data would not be removed)

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Allow saving empty version of track which will automatically be called "Empty"

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Fixed saving changes on folder versions

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Fixed saving multiselected folders

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Fixed small bug when saving folder that contains subfolders

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + added initial support for envelope versions (Volume,Pan,Width)

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + added initial support for envelope versions (Volume,Pan,Width)

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + added all track envelope types versions + fixed bug when creating multiselection version folder and track (would crash),now when multiselecting tracks folders get priority over tracks + show envelope menu only if there is saved envelope + mouse wheel support on envelope menu box + automatically show envelope menu if that envelope is selected + fixed bug when selecting other tracks envelope would crash the script

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + one envelope button (left click saves , right click opens menu) + Right click on envelope version removes it + disabled saving envelopes if multiple tracks are selected (for now) + envelope code improvement + fixed incorect removing of envelopes versions + fixed envelope restoration after removing + disabled showing envelope versions if envelope of other track is selected + show selected envelope version if selected, if not then choose selection + saving envelopes do not require selecting it

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + one envelope button (left click saves , right click opens menu) + Right click on envelope version removes it + disabled saving envelopes if multiple tracks are selected (for now) + envelope code improvement + fixed incorect removing of envelopes versions + fixed envelope restoration after removing + disabled showing envelope versions if envelope of other track is selected + show selected envelope version if selected, if not then choose selection + saving envelopes do not require selecting it + fixed small bug that would crash the script

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + do not allow storing envelope if not visible

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Mousewheel support on envelope menu + Disable saving envelopes if multiple tracks selected

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + envelope right click menu

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + GUI Stores position (dock,x,y) + added user option to color font,checkboxes or both

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + GUI Stores position (dock,x,y) + added user option to color font,checkboxes or both

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + fixed global store settings loop because of deleted tracks + now its run only when deleted tracks action is found

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + manual naming changes and fixes

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + More naming fixes and crash fix + user option to store original track

version.author: SeXan

version.changelog: + spk77 weird folders fix

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + removed store original setting

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + store original track user setting + fixed crash when multiselected tracks do not have same number of versions + fixed manual naming + prevent renaming original version

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + More fixes for hopi and top secret new code inside

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Recording in takes set every take to individual version + fixed storing gui

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + disable creating take versions if there is only 1 take + major bug with gui

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + one more error

version.author: SeXan

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + disable take version for now + fixed empty crash

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + fixed bugs with right click menus + little gui rearange + single save/folder save button based on what type of track is selected + added selected track name to GUI + fixed rec takes to version (thx Spk77)

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + allow storing empty tracks

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Added time selection version (can be created only if version exist) + fixed crash when deleting version after empty is clicked

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + multiedit,comping,view all versions,view time selection version etc

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Fixed copy to destination behavior for both single and multiview. If items overlap the will be trimed

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + More fixes to copy to destination & while in view time selection versions,copy to will copy to current version of time selection view

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + More fixes to copy to destination for multitracks and view time selection + In View all version mode,view time selection mode is not allowed

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Fix copy to destination bug with time selection items geting copied twice

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + When comping overlaping items will trim

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Apply all editing to folders (copy to destination,view time selection items,comping)

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Minor code fix/simplification + Fixed bug when deactivating View time selection versions changing versions would not update for few clicks

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Fix duplicate creating empty versions

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Fix Make versions from loop recording trigerring by itself when recording

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Re-coded the whole envelope code to work as tracks version. Envelopes stored with old version of the script will not work with this version + Added autosave for envelopes + Fixed bug when changing item media source via item properties not saving new file

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Minor bug fixed with creating new envelopes (not creating default one if there is only 1 version)

version.author: SeXan
version.changelog: + Fixed items not updating when renaming file VIA "Rename file..." in media item properties
